title: 08/31/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/31/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin gives his reaction to the shocking NFL news of the day with the Patriots cutting former MVP Cam Newton and announcing Mac Jones as their starting quarterback for week 1. He discusses potential landing spots for Newton considering where he's at in his career and the regular season around the corner. Colin also takes a look at the landscape of young QBs around the NFL and which ones have the best chance to succeed. Plus, 2-time Super Bowl champion and former Cam Newton teammate Torrey Smith joins the show to give his thoughts on Newton getting released by the Patriots.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
